title: These Two Reddit Coins are Getting Massive Addoption
description:
The native tokens of Reddit’s community, Moons (MOON) and Bricks (BRICK), have experienced significant price gains this week after Reddit announced changes to its terms of service. title: Ancient Ethereum Whale Comes Alive, Moves $116,000,000 in ETH at Over 616,000% Profit
description:
A mysterious wallet address that has existed since Ethereum’s (ETH) inception has just moved its entire ETH stash after lying low for about eight years. According to blockchain tracker Lookonchain, the Ethereum whale received 61,216 ETH on July 30th of 2015 after participating in the second-largest crypto asset’s initial coin offering (ICO) the prior year.
